name: napcat-plugin-page2img
description: NapCat 网页转图片插件 - 提供网页截图功能
author: ChuranNeko

scripts.build: vite build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8'));delete pkg.devDependencies;delete pkg.scripts;fs.writeFileSync('dist/package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2));console.log('[OK] package.json copied to dist');"
